description: This file defines a JiraApiService class that provides methods to verify credentials, fetch project lists, and fetch project details from Jira API, using fetch calls and handling authentication headers.

classes.name: JiraApiService
classes.description: A service class for interacting with Jira API, including credential verification and project data retrieval.

methods.name: createAuthHeader
methods.description: Creates a Basic Authentication header using JiraCredentials.

methods.name: getProxyBaseUrl
methods.description: Returns the fixed proxy base URL for all API calls.

methods.name: verifyCredentials
methods.description: Verifies Jira credentials by calling the 'myself' endpoint.

methods.name: fetchProjects
methods.description: Fetches list of Jira projects accessible with provided credentials.

methods.name: fetchProjectDetails
methods.description: Fetches detailed information for a specific Jira project identified by projectKey.
